data.text:
The people at the Cafe restaurant were very friendly and served with great hospitality. Some names I could remember were Nishita, Rita and Anish. 
The only suggestion is; there could me more Indian food options in the room service menu and in the buffet breakfast
data.title: Good place to stay with great hospitality

data.text: We have stayed in the Hotel for almost a week, Hotel is very cozy, staffs are very accommodating especially Apple and Marlyn, the Hotel is in a very nice location, it has a lot restaurants around the place, walking distance to MOE. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends.
data.title: Clean and accomodation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for the feedback on your stay at Citymax Hotel Al Barsha!

Your comments will be shared with our entire staff especially our Delighters Marlyn and Apple.

Thank you for choosing Citymax Hotel Al Barsha and we look forward to welcoming you in the not too distant future!

Best Regards,

Sandeep Sewal
General Manager
owner_response.author: Sandeep Sewal
